title: Ep. 1004 - 'Inciting Violence' By Telling The Truth
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEm 

Today on the Matt Walsh Show, Big Tech has begun banning accounts who they say are inciting violence against medical clinics that butcher and castrate children. But if criticism is incitement, then aren’t we victims of it also? Plus, public health authorities finally admit that monkeypox is a sexually transmitted disease. This raises some extremely disturbing questions about the pets and children that have contracted it. Also, Mike Pence calls on conservatives to stop attacking the FBI. He’s missing the point and I’ll explain why. Pediatricians speak out anonymously against the transing of kids. In our Daily Cancellation, students at the University of Virginia want all mention of their school’s founder erased. 
 
Become a DailyWire+ member to watch Ben Shapiro’s Book Club tonight at 8pm EST: https://utm.io/ueMfc 
 
—
